column3: Formed a multisectorial committee fighting against NCDs and the harmful use of alcohol. Increased involvement of ministries and state institutions working on NCD risk factors and harmful use of alcohol.
Increased taxation and prices of alcoholic beverages.
Introduced Booze Buses programme to increase the random breath testing of drivers.

column2: Reducing the public health impact of illicit alcohol and informally produced alcohol
column3: Introduced Traditional Beer Regulations to control and reduce illicit brews.
Alcohol levy showed a reduction in the recorded consumption of alcohol.
Established the Inter-Ministerial Committee on fighting against the harmful use of alcohol and drugs.
Integrated a Screening and Brief Intervention in the Training Manual of Primary Health Care(PC101).
Established the Inter-Ministerial Committee on Fighting Against Alcohol and Drugs.
Included Integrated Screening and Brief Intervention in the Training Manual of Primary Health Care(PC101).
Trained a pool of Health Personnel in the treatment of addictions (Treatnet) since 2012 by the ONUDC.
Created an action plan for implementation of the National Alcohol Control Policy.
